urls.title: Planning progress and funding success
urls.description: It's been a busy autumn with various planning applications progressing and work starting at Ponts Mill - as well as awards and funding success documents with information about our third package of flood measures in the Luxulyan Road, Cornhill Road, R ose Hill and Doubletrees area - see planning portal reference: PA20/06955 It's been a hectic few months preparing information to support the project's various planning applications with measures across Par and St Blazey. We've also been answering questions

text: So proud of our partnership‚Äôs work to help reduce flood risk in Par and St Blazey - read all about our award and subscribe to our #StARR newsletter https://t.co/Prj3nWyKnP #FloodFriday @CwllCFloodForum @CornwallCouncil @EnvAgencySW @WestcountryRT @UniofExeterESI @SouthWestWater https://t.co/wUfV4PI61z https://t.co/LZi6ZAM5xf
